name: Chest Sim for Fortnite
description:
Collect V-Coins by clicking on the screen!
Open 4 Chest Types - Common Chest, Rare Llama, Epic Llama, Legendary Llama
Get Skins from the Fortnite - Uncommon, Rare, Epic and Legendary!
Buy Upgrades - earn more V-Coins and open more Chests!
Outfits and Back Bling are already here!
Coming Soon - Harvesting Tools and Gliders!
